segments.text: I glance into this kitchen and can't believe my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on full blast, and water's cascading over the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate right there, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the boy's on a stool that's practically tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar—sneaky little guy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up too; they're in cahoots!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle at her feet is huge; how hasn't she slipped?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden—such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see kids raiding cookies mid-disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything's so ordinary yet on the edge of mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Angry thoughts bubble up about the forgotten faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
